content.query:
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE TABLE [gold].[FactOrderFulfillment]
( 
	[OrderID] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[PartnerOrderID] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[ProductID] [nvarchar](50)  NOT NULL,
	[CustomerID] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[OrderDate] [date]  NOT NULL,
	[ShipDate] [date]  NULL,
	[DeliveryDate] [date]  NULL,
	[ReturnDate] [date]  NULL,
	[NetQuantity] [int]  NULL,
	[ShippedQuantity] [int]  NULL,
	[ReturnedQuantity] [int]  NULL,
	[OrderAmount] [decimal](18,2) NULL,
	[ReturnCost] [decimal](18,2)  NULL,
	[DeliveryDelayDays] [int]  NULL,
	[WarehouseID] [nvarchar](50)  NULL,
	[IngestedAt] [datetime2](7)  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO
